metadata.title: BULKSUPPLEMENTS.COM Blackcurrant Powder - Eye Supplements - Black Currants Powder - Black Currant Berry Powder - Antioxidants Supplement - Dried Fruit Powder (250 Grams - 8.8 oz)
features: üü† Boosts Immune Health - Blackcurrant, or Black Currant, is a rich source of Vitamin C and other antioxidants. Vitamin C, which is known for it antioxidant properties, is essential for healthy immune system.* Blackcurrant Powder, an antioxidant supplement, is a natural way to get the daily dose of Vitamin C, making this Black Currant Powder an ideal addition to your diet to boost your overall health.*

üèÉ Promotes Joint Health - Not only does it boosts immune system, Blackcurrant Powder, a high source of Vitamin C and antioxidant supplement, may help promote collagen production, and collagen is important to the joints.* It's also a great source of anthocyanins, a powerful antioxidant, supports joint health, making Blackcurrant Powder, a fruit powder, a natural supplement for those looking to maintain healthy joints.*

‚úîÔ∏è Supports Vibrant & Healthy Skin - Blackcurrant is a source of antioxidants and Gamma-Linoleic Acid (GLA), an important fatty acid for the skin.* This Blackcurrant Powder, an antioxidant supplement and one of eye supplements, may help maintain healthy skin and it's elasticity.* Add this Blackcurrant Supplement, or a berry powder, to your diet and daily regimen for an antioxidant boost!

‚ú® Pure and Natural Supplement - Blackcurrants, or Black currants, are rich in antioxidants and nutrients, which make it essential for promoting health and wellness, an antioxidant supplement.* Our Blackcurrant Powder, an air dried fruit powder, is pure and natural, with no fillers, binders, additives, and artificial flavors, making it perfect for adding to smoothies, juices and any beverages, as well as baked goods.

‚≠ê High Quality - All products by BulkSupplements are manufactured according to cGMP Standards to ensure the highest quality for manufacturing, packaging, labeling, and holding operations. We‚Äôve made a significant investment in our in-house lab so we can test our products at multiple stages during production. We third party test products, procedures and equipment when required to ensure compliance, standards and consistency.
description: Blackcurrant Powder is made from the fruit of the blackcurrant shrub (also known as Black Currant) native to Europe and northern Asia. Blackcurrants are small, black berries that have been cultivated as early as the 11th century in Russia. During WWII, blackcurrants were used as a source of Vitamin C due to a shortage of citrus fruits in the UK. Extremely popular in the UK, blackcurrants were banned in the United States for many years due to erroneous belief that they were the cause of a tree problem. As a result, Americans have missed out on this highly nutritious fruit. Blackcurrant Powder is rich in Vitamin C and loaded with antioxidants, which protect the body from free radicals. It has a high concentration of polyphenols, anthocyanins, and GLA.* The high levels of anthocyanin found in blackcurrant are believed to help maintain eye health and promote healthy eyesight.* Blackcurrant may support immune function, supports cardiovascular function, supports the gut and the kidneys.* Lastly, Our Blackcurrant Powder is pure and natural without any fillers, additives and artificial flavors!
